attributes.name: candidate_experience
attributes.description: The Candidate's work experience summary from CV: company names, job titles, and durations.

attributes.name: candidate_skills
attributes.description: Comma-separated list of key skills from CV (technical and soft skills). Minimum 3 skills

options.systemPromptTemplate: You are an expert HR data extraction algorithm. Extract relevant candidate information from CV text. Be thorough and accurate. For missing fields, return 'Not provided' instead of empty string.

parameters.text:
=You are an expert HR assessment evaluator. Analyze this candidate's application comprehensively.

â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
CANDIDATE PROFILE
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
Name: {{ $json.first_name }} {{ $json.last_name }}
Email: {{ $json.email }}
Phone: {{ $json.phone_number }}
LinkedIn: {{ $json.linkedin_url }}

â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
POSITION APPLIED FOR
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
Role: {{ $json.applied_role }}
Location: {{ $json.job_location }}
Description: {{ $json.job_description }}

Key Responsibilities:
{{ JSON.parse($json.job_responsibilities).map((r, i) => `${i + 1}. ${r}`).join('\n') }}

Required Skills & Qualifications:
{{ JSON.parse($json.job_requirements).map((r, i) => `${i + 1}. ${r}`).join('\n') }}

â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
CANDIDATE'S CV ANALYSIS
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
Experience Summary:
{{ $json.candidate_experience }}

Skills Identified:
{{ $json.candidate_skills }}

â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
ASSESSMENT RESPONSES
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

Q1: Why did you apply to this role?
A: {{ $json.why_apply }}

Q2: What are your strengths and weaknesses for this role?
A: {{ $json.strengths_weaknesses }}

Q3: Tell me about a time you worked in a team
A: {{ $json.team_work }}

Q4: Tell me about a time you had to adapt quickly
A: {{ $json.adapt_quickly }}

Q5: Are you able to work in our office?
A: {{ $json.office_work }}

â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
VIDEO INTRODUCTION TRANSCRIPT
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
{{ $json.video_transcript }}

â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
EVALUATION CRITERIA
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

Score this candidate on a scale of 0-100 based on:

ğŸ¯ RELEVANCE & QUALIFICATION (30 points)
   - CV experience match with job requirements
   - Required skills presence
   - Experience level appropriateness
   - Domain knowledge demonstration

ğŸ’¬ COMMUNICATION & CLARITY (25 points)
   - Response clarity and structure
   - Grammar and language proficiency
   - Complex thought expression
   - Video presentation quality
   - STAR method usage

ğŸ”¥ MOTIVATION & CULTURAL FIT (25 points)
   - Genuine role interest
   - Compelling motivation
   - Job understanding
   - Self-awareness
   - Location compatibility

â­ PROFESSIONALISM & POTENTIAL (20 points)
   - Overall impression
   - Application attention to detail
   - Growth mindset
   - Collaboration examples
   - Red flags assessment

â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
SCORING GUIDELINES
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

PROCEED_TO_INTERVIEW (75-100): Strong match across all criteria
CONSIDER_WITH_CAUTION (60-74): Meets some requirements, has potential but concerns exist
REJECT (<60): Does not meet minimum requirements or major red flags present

â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

Provide your evaluation in this EXACT JSON structure with integer scores only:

{
  "total_score": 85,
  "relevance_score": 25,
  "communication_score": 22,
  "motivation_score": 20,
  "professionalism_score": 18,
  "justification": "2-3 sentence summary",
  "strengths": ["strength 1", "strength 2", "strength 3"],
  "concerns": ["concern 1", "concern 2"],
  "recommendation": "PROCEED_TO_INTERVIEW",
  "key_insights": "One paragraph summary"
}

Respond with raw JSON only (no markdown, no backticks).

parameters.subject: =Your Aplication for {{ $('Prepare_Candidate_Data1').item.json.applied_role }}
parameters.bodyContent:
= Application Received

Application Received â€“ {{ $('Prepare_Candidate_Data1').item.json.applied_role }}

Dear {{ $('Prepare_Candidate_Data1').item.json.first_name }},

Thank you for applying for the {{ $('Prepare_Candidate_Data1').item.json.applied_role }} position at Apollo Green Solution. Weâ€™ve successfully received your application materials.

Our recruitment team is reviewing your submission. If your profile aligns with our current requirements, weâ€™ll contact you about the next steps.

Candidate:

{{ $('Prepare_Candidate_Data1').item.json.first_name }} {{ $('Prepare_Candidate_Data1').item.json.last_name }} Â· {{ $('Prepare_Candidate_Data1').item.json.email }}

Position:

{{ $('Prepare_Candidate_Data1').item.json.applied_role }} â€“ {{ $('Application_Intake').item.json.body.jobLocation }}

If you have any questions, you can reply to this email or contact us at {{$json.company_email || 'hr@example.com'}} .

Kind regards,
HR Team
{{$json.sender_title || ""}} {{$json.company_name || "Apollo Green Solution"}}

Apollo Green Solution Â· {{$json.company_website || 'https://www.apollo-gs.com'}} {{ $json.company_address ? ('Â· ' + $json.company_address) : '' }}

This message was sent by Apollo Green Solution in response to your application.

parameters.subject: =âŒ Invalid Date Format - {{ $('Extract_Interview_Details').item.json.candidate_name }}
parameters.bodyContent:
=The interview scheduling failed due to invalid date format.

Please reply with the correct format:

START: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM
END: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM

Example:
START: 2025-10-20 14:00
END: 2025-10-20 15:00

Candidate: {{ $('Extract_Interview_Details').item.json.candidate_name }}

ğŸ“ Before the interview

{{$json.company_name || 'HR Team'}}

Please add this meeting to your calendar and be prepared to join at the scheduled time.

parameters.subject: =Your Application Result for {{ $('Prepare_Candidate_Data1').item.json.applied_role }}
parameters.bodyContent:
= Application Update

Application Update â€“ {{ $('Prepare_Candidate_Data1').item.json.applied_role }}

Dear {{ $('Prepare_Candidate_Data1').item.json.first_name }},

Thank you for taking the time to apply for the {{ $('Prepare_Candidate_Data1').item.json.applied_role }} position at Apollo Green Solution and for participating in our assessment process.

After a detailed review, weâ€™ve decided not to move forward with your application at this stage. This decision was based on a comprehensive evaluation of all criteria outlined for the role.

Summary of Feedback

{{ $('AI_Candidate_Scoring1').item.json.output.justification }}

Strengths:

    {{ $('AI_Candidate_Scoring1').item.json.output.strengths.map(strength => `
  • ${strength}
    • `).join('') }}

Areas for improvement:

    {{ $('AI_Candidate_Scoring1').item.json.output.concerns.map(strength => `
  • ${strength}
    • `).join('') }}

We sincerely appreciate your interest in joining Apollo Green Solution and encourage you to apply for future openings that align with your skills and experience.

Wishing you every success in your career journey.
HR Team
Apollo Green Solution

Apollo Green Solution Â· {{$json.company_website || 'https://www.apollo-gs.com'}}

This message was sent by Apollo Green Solution in response to your application.

parameters.content:
## ğŸ“¬ Application Intake (Webhook Trigger)


1. Receives new candidate submissions directly from the career page form.
2. Captures CV (PDF), video (MP4), and form data in real-time.
3. Launches the full automation instantly when a new form is received.

## ğŸ“ CV & Video Upload + Processing

1. Uploads both candidate files to Google Drive for secure cloud storage.
2. Extracts text from CV (PDF) and transcribes video introductions into text.
3. Ensures every application has readable, searchable data for AI analysis.

## ğŸ”— Data Merge & Aggregation

1. Merges all sources â€“ form data, CV text, video transcript â€“ into a unified record.
2. Cleans and organizes the data structure before it moves to AI evaluation.
3. Foundation for consistent, bias-free candidate scoring in later steps.

## ğŸ§  Intelligent CV Information Extraction

Uses OpenAIâ€™s GPT-4o-mini model to analyze the candidateâ€™s CV text.
Automatically identifies key data such as:
â€“ Work experience (companies, job titles, durations)
â€“ Technical and soft skills
â€“ Missing or incomplete information

Converts unstructured CVs into clean, structured data for scoring and storage.

## ğŸ“¦ Preparing Candidate Profile for Evaluation

1. Consolidates all extracted and form data into a unified candidate profile.
2. Assigns fields such as name, email, LinkedIn, applied role, and skills.
3. Generates a unique candidate_id to avoid duplicates in the database.

Ensures every applicantâ€™s information is standardized and ready for AI scoring and Notion integration.

## ğŸ¤– Comprehensive AI Evaluation

Uses GPT-4 to analyze the full candidate profile â€” CV, video transcript, and form responses.
Scores applicants across four key areas:
â€¢ Relevance & Qualification (30 pts)
â€¢ Communication & Clarity (25 pts)
â€¢ Motivation & Cultural Fit (25 pts)
â€¢ Professionalism & Potential (20 pts)

The model returns a structured JSON report with total score, strengths, concerns, and recommendation (e.g. Proceed to Interview, Reject).

âœ… Enables consistent, bias-free, and explainable hiring decisions.

## ğŸ“˜ Smart Applicant Management in Notion

Checks whether a candidate already exists in the Notion â€œHR Automation â€“ Applicantsâ€ database using their unique candidate_id.

ğŸ§© If the application already exists â†’ updates the existing page with the latest score, status, and feedback.
ğŸ†• If itâ€™s a new candidate â†’ creates a fresh record with full details from the workflow.

Ensures a single, clean source of truth for all applicants â€” no duplicates, no missing data, fully audit-ready.

## ğŸ“§ Sending Professional Acknowledgment Emails 

Uses Microsoft Outlook integration to automatically send a branded confirmation email to each candidate.

The email includes:
â€¢ Candidateâ€™s name and role applied for
â€¢ Confirmation that their CV and video were received
â€¢ Company branding and HR contact details

ğŸ’¼ Delivers instant, professional communication - maintaining transparency and engagement from the first interaction.

## âš™ï¸ Automated Decision Routing

Uses conditional logic to decide the next action based on the AI score.

âœ… If candidate score > 60 â†’ Sends an interactive email to HR (Send_Message_And_Wait_Response) to schedule an interview.
âŒ If score â‰¤ 60 â†’ Sends a personalized rejection email with structured feedback.

This ensures every candidate receives timely and appropriate communication - maintaining fairness, transparency, and efficiency throughout the hiring process.

## ğŸ“† Interactive Interview Scheduling

Sends an Outlook email form to HR, allowing them to input interview start and end times directly from their inbox.

The workflow then:
â€¢ Extracts entered details automatically (Extract_Interview_Details)
â€¢ Validates date and time format (Validate_Date_Format)
â€¢ Ensures accurate scheduling before creating the official event.

ğŸ’¡ Simplifies coordination - no manual calendar editing or back-and-forth emails required.

## ğŸ“† Automated Interview Scheduling & Tracking 
Once the date is validated, the system:
â€¢ Creates an official Outlook calendar event with the interview details and meeting link.
â€¢ Sends a personalized calendar invite to the candidate (Send_Calendar_Invite).
â€¢ Notifies HR of the successful scheduling (Confirm_To_HR).
â€¢ Updates the Notion database with interview date, status, and timestamps.

âœ… Ensures end-to-end visibility and zero manual work - from scheduling to record-keeping.

## âš ï¸ Smart Error Detection & Notifications

Automatically identifies workflow issues - like invalid date formats or missing interview details.

When an error occurs, the system:
â€¢ Sends an instant email alert to HR explaining the issue (Send_Error_Notification).
â€¢ Suggests the correct input format for quick resolution.

ğŸ’¡ Ensures the automation remains reliable and transparent, with human oversight only when needed.

## ğŸ“© Automated HR Confirmation

Sends a confirmation email to the HR team once the interview has been successfully scheduled.

The message includes:
â€¢ Candidateâ€™s name, role, and interview time
â€¢ Confirmation that the calendar event was created
â€¢ Quick visibility for HR without checking the system manually

âœ… Closes the loop with a transparent, automated confirmation - ensuring HR is always informed and in control.
